title: Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 82 - Looking for Love in Buffalo (feat. Maddy Smith)
description:
Maddy Smith joins the show again to talk about Miles Teller, Aaron Rodgers haircut, her mission to date a Buffalo Bills player, soft faces, and more. Francis also drops in later in the episode to tell some stories about his time on the road with Sas and Maddy. Funny episode.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/sonofaboydad
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
